metadata.key_specifications: Ultra-low 700nA quiescent current in low power mode, 1.25V to 5.5V input range, 500mA peak current limit, integrated LDO/load switch, dual output modes (active and low power), up to 80% efficiency at 10uA load from 2V to 3.3V conversion, up to 90% efficiency at 5mA to 100mA load from 2V to 3.3V conversion, thermal shutdown, DFN1.5mmx1.5mm-6 package

page_summaries.content:
JW5701 Series  
Ultra-Low Quiescent Current Synchronous 
Boost with Integrated LDO /Load Switch 

DESCRIPTION 
The JW5701A / JW5701B / JW5701E / JW5701F 
/ JW5701G  provides an ultra -low power solution 
for products powered by either a one-cell coin cell 
or one -cell Li -ion or other kinds of battery. It 
integrates a synchronous boost converter with a 
low-dropout linear regulator (LDO) or load switch 
and provides dual output rails. 
The JW5701 series is capable of supplying up to 
100mA total output current at 1.25V input to 3.3V 
output. Based on  a hysteretic controller topology, 
the boost uses synchronous power switches to 
obtain maximum efficiency at minimal quiescent 
current. 

FEATURES 
• 700nA Ultra-low IQ in Low Power Mode 
• Startup into Load(3kΩ) at 1.25V Input Voltage  
• 1.25V to 5.5V Operating Input Range 
• 500mA Switch Peak Current Limit. 
• Integrated LDO/load Switch 
• Two Modes Controlled by MODE Pin 
  - Active Mode: Dual Outputs at Set Values 
  - Low Power Mode: LDO/load Switch off; 
    Boost Keeps on 
• Automatic Pass-through 
• Up to 80% Efficiency at 10uA Load from 2V 
  to 3.3V Conversion (Low Power Mode) 
• Up to 90% Efficiency at 5mA ~ 100 mA Load 
  from 2V to 3.3V Conversion  
• Thermal Shutdown 
• Available in DFN1.5mmx1.5mm-6 Package 

APPLICATIONS 
• Single Coin Cell, Single or Two-cell Alkaline 
  Powered Applications 
• Wearable Applications 
• Low Power Wireless Applications 
• Portable Consumer or Medical Products

Product Summary.content: The JW5701 Series provides an ultra-low power solution for products powered by a one-cell coin cell, one-cell Li-ion, or other types of batteries. It integrates a synchronous boost converter with a low-dropout linear regulator (LDO) or load switch, offering dual output rails. The series is capable of supplying up to 100mA total output current at 1.25V input to 3.3V output, utilizing a hysteretic controller topology and synchronous power switches for maximum efficiency at minimal quiescent current.

Key features of the JW5701 Series include 700nA ultra-low quiescent current in low power mode, startup into load (3kΩ) at 1.25V input voltage, 1.25V to 5.5V operating input range, 500mA switch peak current limit, integrated LDO/load switch, two modes (active mode with dual outputs and low power mode with LDO/load switch off), automatic pass-through, up to 80% efficiency at 10uA load from 2V to 3.3V conversion in low power mode, up to 90% efficiency at 5mA to 100mA load from 2V to 3.3V conversion, thermal shutdown, and availability in a DFN1.5mmx1.5mm-6 package.

The JW5701 Series is suitable for various applications, including single coin cell, single or two-cell alkaline powered applications, wearable applications, low power wireless applications, and portable consumer or medical products.
